title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

title: ADULT EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level   passes.

(ii)           NCE merit in two (2) subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Government/History, one (1) Social Science subject and any other subject.

title: AGRIC-ECONOMICS & EXTENSION
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one of Zoology/Botany/Agricultural Science/Biology, Geography, Mathematics, Physics, Geology, Economics and Health Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and one of Geography, Physics and Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/ Agricultural Science plus Mathematics or Physics.

title: AGRICULTURAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes or equivalent in Physics and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any from Introduction to Agricultural Science, Materials and Workshop Process and Machining, Tractor Layout Power Unit Under Carriage and Auto Electricity; Transmission System; Implement and Machine; Principles of Crop Husbandry and Land Use, Materials and Workshop Processes; Construction and Maintenance of Agricultural Machines; general Metal Work; General Wood Work and Building/Engineering Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.

title: AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE & EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) passes at 'A' Level in Chemistry, Biology any other Science subject.

(ii) NCE merit in Chemistry and Biology.

        (iii) NCE merit in Agriculture (Double Major).
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or equivalents in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and another relevant subject.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology or Agriculture and Any other subject.

title: AGRICULTURE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one from Biology/Botany/Zoology/Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology/Mathematics (Pure & Applied).
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and  any one of Mathematics, Physics, Geography and  Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any one of Physics or Mathematics.

title: ANATOMY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Biology, Chemistry and Physics in addition to the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: APPLIED BIOLOGY
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes in Biology, Chemistry and Physics.


(ii) NCE minimum of eight (8) points in Biology and Chemistry minus Education.


(iii) National Diploma with minimum of Upper Credit in relevant programme.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes  in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and any one (1) Physics and Geography.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and either Physics or Mathematics.

title: ARABIC STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arabic and any other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Arabic and three (3) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts and/or Social Sciences.

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes from Mathematics and Physics and any from Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

(ii) ND with minimum of Upper credits in relevant field.

(iii) HND with minimum of Lower credits in relevant field.

(iv) GCE 'A' Level or its equivalent with credits passes at not more than two sittings in English, Mathematics, Physics and one (1) other subject from Geography, Chemistry, Biology, Technical Drawing and Fine Arts.

NCE Not accepted.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two (2), one of which must be selected from Further Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology, Geography Agricultural Science, Engineering/Technical Drawing, Building Construction, History, Literature, Music and Fine Arts.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Biology or Fine Art.

title: AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in any two (2) of  Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry ,English Language and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics

title: BANKING & FINANCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2)'A' Level passes in Accounting or Economics and one other subject.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects.

(iii) ND credit.
(iv) Foundation International exam such as ICAN, ACCA, ICMA, GPFA.
utme_requirements:
Five (5)SSC credit passes including
English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, one Social Science subject and any other subject

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE/ND/HND in related programmes plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOLOGICAL SCIENCE(S)
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include one (1) of Botany, Zoology, Biology or Chemistry.

 

(ii)    ND/NCE in related programme/subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOLOGY
de_requirements:
i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Botany/Zoology.

(ii) NCE merit accepted.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Mathematics/Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BOTANY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/Botany/Zoology and Chemistry or Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounts, Business Management, Government, Geography or Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, plus any two (2) of Accounting, Business Methods, Commerce, Government, Geography, and Statistics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

title: CHEMICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and English Language and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.

 

(ii)   ND/NCE with good grades in relevant 'O' Level subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)	'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.
(ii)	ND/HND upper credit at appropriate levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one Science subject
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics

title: COMMON & ISLAMIC LAW
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) A’ level credit passes to include English Language and Islamic Studies.

(ii) Diploma with minimum of Upper Credit in Law.

NCE not accepted
utme_requirements: Five (5)'O' Level credit passes in English Language, Islamic Studies, Literature in English and any two (2) from Arts, Science or Social Sciences.
subjects: Literature in English, Islamic Studies and any of Arts, Science or Social Sciences.

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Three (3) 'A' Level passes in Pure Mathematics or Pure and Applied Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Mathematics, Further Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and 

English Language.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Chemistry or Physics.

(ii)   ND with minimum of Upper Credit in Computer Science.


(iii) NCE minimum of eight (8) points in Mathematics and Computer minus Education.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry plus one (1) other subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: CRIMINOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level credit passes in Sociology, Economics, Geography, Accounting, Commerce or Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, two (2) from Social Science subjects and additional two (2) from Arts, Science or Social Science.
subjects: Any two subjects from Economics, Geography, Accounting, Commerce or Government and one (1) from Arts, Science or Social Science.

title: CYBER SECURITY SCIENCE
de_requirements:
i)      Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE minimum of eight (8) points in Mathematics and one (1) other Science subject minus education.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, or Geography.

title: DENTISTRY & DENTAL SURGERY
de_requirements: Three (3) 'A' Level passes to include Chemistry, Biology/Zoology and Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and one (1) other Science subject.

title: EARLY CHILDHOOD EDUCATION
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ Level credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Accounting, Business Management, History and Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any of Government, History, Geography, Literature in English, French and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

title: EDUCATION & ARABIC
de_requirements:
(i)Diploma at minimum of Credit/Upper Credit level 

(ii) NCE in relevant Arts subjects including Arabic
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in relevant Arts subjects including English Language and Arabic.
subjects: Arabic and any two (2) relevant Arts subjects (Government can substitute for History).

title: EDUCATION & BIOLOGY
de_requirements: NCE/'A' Level passes in Biology and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and one (1) other subject.
subjects: Biology and two (2) other subjects from Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

title: EDUCATION & CHEMISTRY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level/NCE passes including Chemistry and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits in Mathematics, Chemistry, English Language and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) other subjects chosen from Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: EDUCATION & ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Economics and one (1) other relevant Social Science subject.

(ii) NCE merit/credit in Economics and one (1) other subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Economics and Mathematics.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any (1) other subject from Geography, Government, Accounting and Commerce.

title: EDUCATION & ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: EDUCATION & FRENCH
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes/NCE merit in French and one(1) other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and French.
subjects: French plus two (2) other Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION & GEOGRAPHY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes/NCE merit which should include Geography

/Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Geography, English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Geography plus two (2) other Social Sciences/Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION & HAUSA
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects to include Hausa.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Hausa.
subjects: Hausa, one (1) Arts and one (1) subject from Economics, French, Geography/Physics, Government, History, Islamic Studies, Literature in English and Mathematics.

title: EDUCATION & HISTORY
de_requirements: Two (2) NCE merit/'A' Level passes in History and one (1) other relevant Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, History and three (3) relevant Arts subjects.
subjects: History and any other two (2) subjects chosen from Christian Religious Studies / Islamic Studies, Literature in English, French, Yoruba, Geography/Physics, Economics, Government and Hausa.

title: EDUCATION & ISLAMIC STUDIES
de_requirements:
(i) NCE merit in Islamic Studies and Education.

 

(ii) 'A' Level passes in Arabic/ Islamic Studies and any other relevant subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Islamic Studies and three (3) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Islamic Studies/Arabic and two (2) other Social Science or Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION & MATHEMATICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes/NCE in Mathematics and one (1) Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics plus one (1) other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of the following Science subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: EDUCATION & PHYSICS
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii) NCE credit/merit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credits passes to include English Language, Physics, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects or NTC/NBC.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics or Chemistry plus one (1) other subjects.

title: ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)      'A' Level passes in Mathematics and Physics.

 ND/HND in Elect Eng. Upper/Lower credit respectively.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and English Language.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: ELECTRONICS & PHYSICS
de_requirements: NCE/Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject from Further Mathematics and Biology or Agricultural Science.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or Biology.

title: ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English, English Language and three other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: ENTREPRENEURSHIP
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include Economics and at least one of, Accounts, Business Management, Government, Geography or Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics, one Science subject and one other Social Science or Commercial subject.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one other Social Science or Commercial subject.

title: ENVIRONMENTAL HEALTH SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i)              Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/ Zoology, Chemistry and Physics plus  three (3) other 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and English Language.

(ii)            NRN or its approved equivalent plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes  in English Language and four (4) Science subjects chosen from Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Human Anatomy, Physiology and Hygiene, Health Science, Further Mathematics and General Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology, Physics and English Language
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: ENVIRONMENTAL MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Geography and one of Biology, Physics, Chemistry or Agriculture.

(ii) OND with minimum of Lower Credit in relevant programs.

(iii) NCE with minimum of eight (8) in Applied Sciences minus Education.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Geography and any of Biology, Chemistry or Agricultural Science.
subjects: Mathematics, Geography and any one of Biology, Physics, Agricultural Science or Chemistry.

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) ‘A’ Level credit passes in Mathematics, Economics, and any from Geography, Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Technical Drawing and Fine Arts.

(ii) ND with minimum of Upper Credit in Estate Management.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two from Chemistry, Physics, Biology, Business Studies/Commerce, Geography, Agricultural Science, Building Construction, Technical Drawing and Fine Arts.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one from Chemistry, Physics, Biology, Geography or Fine Arts.

title: FISHERIES & AQUACULTURE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Chemistry, Biology, Botany, Zoology, Agricultural Science Geography, Mathematics (pure & applied), Physics, Geology and Economics.

 

(ii)NCE Agriculture
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and English Language plus any other Science subject.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any other Science subject.

title: FOOD SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
(i)       'A' Level credit passes in two (2) of Chemistry, Biology or Agriculture and Mathematics or Physics.

(ii)     ND/HND upper credit in relevant programmes.

(iii)  NCE - Agricultural Science Double Major with minimum of 'B' grade minus   Education.

        NCE - Chemistry with Physics or Biology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology or Agriculture and Physics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology or Agriculture and any of Mathematics or Physics.

title: FORENSIC SCIENCE
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE/ND/HND in related programmes plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: FORESTRY & WILDLIFE MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) ’A’ Level passes in Chemistry and Biology or Agric Science or Zoology or Botany
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology and one of Physics, Economics, Further Mathematics and Statistics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and Physics or Mathematics.

title: FRENCH
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including French and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including French and English Language plus one other Arts subject.
subjects: French and any other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

title: GEOGRAPHY
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Geography and any one of Economics., Government, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and Mathematics
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Geography, and any three (3) from Arts or Social Science subjects with at least a pass in Mathematics.
subjects: Geography and two (2) other Arts or Social Science subjects

title: GEOGRAPHY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Geography and one (1) other science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Geography and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Geography and any two (2) of Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Agricultural Science.

title: GEOLOGY
de_requirements: (i) Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes in Geology and one from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics or Biology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, and Physics.
subjects: Chemistry, Physics, and Biology.

title: HAUSA
de_requirements: Two (2) A’ Level passes in Hausa and any other relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and Hausa.
subjects: Hausa and any one of Government, History, Islamic Studies and Arabic

title: HEALTH EDUCATION
de_requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

 

(ii)  NCE merit in Physical Education and credit in Arithmetical process or Mathematics.

 

(iii)  Diploma in Health Education, Environmental Sanitation, Physical Education, Social work, Health Administration with overall grades of merit plus three (3) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit which should include English Language.

 

(iv) NCE in Biology, Health Education, and Integrated Science with a pass grade plus two (2) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit passes.

 

(v)    Registered Nurse plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language.
utme_requirements:
i) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes including     English Language, Biology or its equivalent.

 

ii) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) relevant subjects.

title: HISTORY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in History and any other related subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include History and English Language.
subjects: History and any other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

title: INDUSTRIAL CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and Mathematics

(ii)   ND in Science Technology or ND in relevant programmes with the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and Biology/Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and any of Physics/Biology/ Agricultural Science.

title: INFORMATION SCIENCE & MEDIA STUDIES
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes in Arts, Science or Social Sciences.

(ii) ND with minimum of Upper Credit in Mass Communication.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, any two from Arts, Science or Social Sciences and two additional credits.
subjects: Two (2) subjects from Arts, Science or Social Sciences and one (1) Additional Subject.

title: INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE minimum of (8) points in Mathematics and one (1) other Science subject minus education.


(iii) National Diploma with minimum of Upper Credit in relevant program.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, or Geography.

title: INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Social Science subject from Government/History, Economics, Sociology and Business Management.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Government or History and three (3) relevant subjects.
subjects: Economics, Literature in English and Geography/Government/History.

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES

subjects: Islamic Studies plus two (2) other Arts subjects.

title: LIBRARY & INFORMATION SCIENCE

(ii) NCE merit in two (2) relevant Arts, Science or Social Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language and any four (4) relevant Arts/Sciences/Social Sciences subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects, two of which must be from Arts, Sciences or Social Sciences.

title: LINGUISTICS

subjects: Any Language and two (2) other subjects.

utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language and four (4) other subjects in Arts or Social Sciences.
subjects: Any three (3) from Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: MATHEMATICS
de_requirements:
) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and any other science subject.

(ii)           NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) of Physics, Chemistry or Economics

subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.

title: MEDICAL LABORATORY SCIENCE
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes   to include Physics, Chemistry and Biology or Zoology
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: MEDICINE & SURGERY

(i) 'A' Level passes in Physics, Chemistry and Biology or Zoology in addition to the UTME requirements.

(ii) BSC, BOS, etc in relevant programme.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: METEOROLOGY
de_requirements:
ND upper credit in Meteorology in addition to the 'O' Level requirements.  OR

(ii)WMO Class II Certificate in Weather Forecasting in     addition to the 'O' Level requirements.

(iii) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and Physics in addition to the SSC requirements.

title: MICROBIOLOGY
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes in Biology and Chemistry.

(ii) ND with minimum of Upper Credit in relevant Programs.

(iii) NCE with minimum of eight (8) points in Biology and Chemistry minus Education.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: NURSING/NURSING SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i)              'A' Level passes in any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics

(ii)            ND Upper Credit in Prosthesis and Orthopaedic Technology.

(i)              Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/ Zoology, Chemistry and Physics plus  three (3) other 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and English Language.

(ii)            NRN or its approved equivalent plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes  in English Language and four (4) Science subjects chosen from Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Human Anatomy, Physiology and Hygiene, Health Science, Further Mathematics and General Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics.

title: NUTRITION & DIETETICS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry, Biology and Physics plus the UTME requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics.

title: OPTOMETRY
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in  Physics, Chemistry and Biology or Zoology
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Maths, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: PETROLEUM ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes to include Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and any one Science subject.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics

title: PHARMACY
de_requirements: Three (3) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry, Biology/Zoology and Physics or Mathematics plus UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: PHYSICAL & HEALTH EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

 

(ii)  NCE merit in Physical Education and credit in Arithmetical process or Mathematics.

 

(iii)  Diploma in Health Education, Environmental Sanitation, Physical Education, Social work, Health Administration with overall grades of merit plus three (3) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit which should include English Language.

 

(iv) NCE in Biology, Health Education, and Integrated Science with a pass grade plus two (2) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit passes.

 

(v)    Registered Nurse plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language.
utme_requirements:
i) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes including     English Language, Biology or its equivalent.

 

ii) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) relevant subjects.

title: PHYSICAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

 

(ii)  NCE merit in Physical Education and credit in Arithmetical process or Mathematics.

 

(iii)  Diploma in Health Education, Environmental Sanitation, Physical Education, Social work, Health Administration with overall grades of merit plus three (3) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit which should include English Language.

 

(iv) NCE in Biology, Health Education, and Integrated Science with a pass grade plus two (2) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit passes.

 

(v)    Registered Nurse plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language.
utme_requirements:
i) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes including     English Language, Biology or its equivalent.

 

ii) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) relevant subjects.

title: PHYSICS
de_requirements: NCE/Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject from Further Mathematics and Biology or Agricultural Science.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or Biology.

title: PHYSIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Physics and Biology/Zoology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Maths, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: PHYSIOTHERAPY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Maths, Biology, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: PLANT BIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/Botany/Zoology and Chemistry or Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes from Social Sciences to include Government.

(ii) National Diploma with minimum of Upper Credit in Public Administration.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in  English Language, Government or History, a credit pass in social sciences and two (2) additional credits in other subjects.
subjects: Two subjects from Social sciences to include Government and a subject from Arts, Science or Social Sciences.

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from relevant subjects
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ Level credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes from Social Science to include Government and a subject fro Arts, science or Social Sciences.

(ii) ND with minimum of Upper Credit in Public Administration.


NCE not accepted.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Government, credit passes in Social Science and one additional credit.
subjects: Two subjects from Social Science to include Government and a subject from Arts, Science or Social Sciences.

title: QUANTITY SURVEYING
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes in Mathematics and Physics.

(ii) ND Upper Credit in Quantity Surveying, Building, Architecture and Civil Engineering.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, and two (2) from Chemistry, Geography, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Building Construction and Commerce.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Building Construction, Technical Drawing, Commerce, Biology and Economics.

title: RADIOGRAPHY
de_requirements: (i)     Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Physics and Chemistry.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: SOCIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level credit passes in Sociology, Economics, Accounting, Commerce or Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, two from Social Science subjects and additional two (2) from Arts, Science or Social Sciences.
subjects: Any two (2) subjects from Economics, Accounting, Commerce or Government and one (1) from Arts, Science or social Sciences.

title: SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any three (3) subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in any two (2) subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) Subjects

title: STATISTICS
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include Mathematics or Statistics.

NCE credit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and at least three (3) subjects from Physics, Statistics, Chemistry, Further Mathematics, Economics and Geography.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics.

title: TAXATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Accounting or Economics and one other subject.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects.

(iii) ND credit.

(iv) Foundation International exam such as ICAN, ACCA, ICMA, GPFA.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes including

English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, one Social Science subject and any other subject

title: TEACHER EDUCATION SCIENCE:
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: TECHNICAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)     NCE merit in two (2) relevant Science subjects plus the UTME requirements.

 

(ii)    Two 'A' Level passes in Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in relevant subjects which must include English Language and Mathematics or NTC/NBC.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry.

title: TELECOMMUNICATION ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes/ND and HND in relevant subjects into 200 and 300 levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Economics and Mathematics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any one of Account, Commerce and Government.

title: THEATRE & PERFORMING ARTS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arts, Social Sciences or Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and Arts subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and two (2) other relevant subjects.

title: URBAN & REGIONAL PLANNING
de_requirements:
(i)      Two (2) A’ LEVEL credit passes in Geography and Economics

(ii) ND minimum of Upper Credit in Urban & regional Planning, Architecture, land survey, Estate Management and Civil Engineering
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography, and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Economics, Government, Biology, Fine Art, Business Studies, Commerce, Agricultural science, Building Construction and Technical Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, Geography and one of Economics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology or Fine Arts.

title: VETERINARY MEDICINE
de_requirements: A' level passes in Chemistry, Biology/Zoology, Physics or Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' level credit passes to include English Language, Biology, Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry  and Biology.

title: ZOOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE in Biology, Zoology or Botany and one other Science subject
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology and two (2) other Science subject.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
